title: Courgette, walnut and date cake
ingredients: ['3 eggs', '250ml vegetable oil', '400g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '250g grated courgette', '1 (227g) tin pineapple, drained and finely chopped in a food processor', '375g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '3/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon baking powder', '150g dates, pitted and chopped', '115g chopped walnuts']
